name: QuranCube
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quran cube
des:
AsSalaamualaykum, The Quran Cube Skill is a Quran Player which allows you to listen to any Surah of the Quran by your chosen recitors. 

The skills audio content is in Arabic.

You can select from 15 Reciters with Full Arabic Qurans and 2 Recitations with English Translation. 
To open the “Quran Cube” skill you can say “Alexa, Open Quran Cube” 

The Skill will ask you which surah you want to play. You can select a Surah by saying the Surah name, or Surah number. For example for Surah Yaseen, you would say “Surah Yaseen” or “ Chapter 36.”
If you want to choose your surah with your first phrase, say “Alexa, Ask Quran Cube to play chapter (name or number)”. Alexa will now play your chosen chapter. 

The skill will automatically play using Reciter 1 (Sheikh Mahir al Muaiqly), 

To hear the reciter list say, “Alexa, Ask Quran Cube to show me the reciter list.”

To select the reciter, say Alexa, Select Reciter (Number) or (Name) 

Reciter list below :
1. Shaikh Maahir Al Muaiqly
2. Shaikh Sudais
3. Shaikh Shuraym
4. Shaikh Yasser Al Dossary
5. Shaikh Abdullah Juhany
6. Shaikh Salaah Al Budair
7. Shaikh Ahmad Al Ajmy
8. Shaikh Abu Bakr Ash Shatri
9. Shaikh Saad Al Ghamdi
10. Shaikh Abdur Rahman Al Oosi
11. Shaikh Mishary Al Afasy
12. Shaikh Bandar Baleelaah
13. Shaikh hudhayfee
14. Shaikh Luhaydaan
15. Mishary Al Afasy with English Translation
16 . Shaikh Sudais with English Translation


To Pause the audio, Say “Alexa, Pause.”
To Resume audio, Say “ Alexa, Resume.”
To Play the Next Surah /Chapter, Say “Alexa, Next”
To Play the Previous Surah / Chapter, Say “Alexa, Previous”
To Repeat The Current Chapter, Say “Alexa, Repeat This Chapter.”

Please Keep The Quran Cube Team In Your Prayers.

Contact Us At QuranCube.com 

Note: Some content of the skill might be in another language than English i.e Arabic
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
